thread.title: Filip Degaj
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Filip Degaj

author: Filip Degaj
title: Filip Degaj
text: When I was told they would come between 9 and 11pm I thought to myself no fricken way... Well they showed up and did a great job getting my dinning room set placed. Thanks guys! Thanks also to Adam at the Warren store for getting our needs taken care of quickly. Top notch!
